data.title: Secret Sunshine (Milyang)
data.meta_description: Lee Shin-ae (Jeon Do-yeon) is a young widow left in a world of grief with the burden of her husband's death. She decides to take her son and move to the small town of Miryang, where her husband grew up, to try to restart her life. While driving to Miryang for the first time, her car breaks down, which leads her to meet the town's mechanic, Kim Jong-chan (Song Kang-ho). Shin-ae and the mechanic hot it off despite their different social backgrounds and cherish each other's presence, and Shin-ae starts to feel relieved with a glimmer of hope of her life turning normal... until her whole life is turned upside down once again. This South Korean drama is directed by Lee Chang-dong and based on the writing of Yi Chong-jun.
